title: US drilling states guided on handling quakes
text:
28 US drilling states guided on handling quakes 
Fuel Fix: COLUMBUS, Ohio â€” A group of U.S. drilling states, seismologists, academics and industry experts issued guidance Monday in a frank new report on handling human-induced earthquakes caused by hydraulic fracturing or the disposal of fracking wastewater.
